content: of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st round 3 double_crochet to end of round 9 st round 4 * 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * ** to end of round 12 st rounds 5-6 double_crochet to end of round 12 st round 7 * 2 double_crochet in same st 3 double_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 15 st rounds 8-9 double_crochet to end of round 15 st slip_stitch break off yarn and use invisible fasten_off flatten piece c using yellow yarn start with 6-double_crochet magic_ring working in the round round 1 double_crochet to end of round 6 st round 2 * 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet ** repeat * ** to end of round 9 st round 3 double_crochet to end of round 9 st round 4 * 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st ** repeat * ** to end of round 12 st rounds 5-6 double_crochet to end of round 12 st do not fasten_off flatten so that final st of round is on the right side as per instructions for ventral fin © akabekobotan 2016 assembly round 1 line up previously made pieces of the fin a-b-c from left to right and work 6 double_crochet across the front side of piece c 8 double_crochet across the front side of piece b then continue double_crochet across the top of piece a turn work and continue double_crochet across the top of the reverse side 42 st round 2 * 5 double_crochet decrease 6 double_crochet decrease 5 double_crochet decrease ** repeat * to ** to end of round round 3 double_crochet to end of round round 4 double_crochet decrease 5 double_crochet decrease 2 double_crochet decrease 5 double_crochet decrease double_crochet round 5 double_crochet to end of round round 6 double_crochet decrease 3 double_crochet decrease 3 double_crochet decrease 5 double_crochet decrease 3 double_crochet decrease 3 double_crochet slip_stitch break off yarn use invisible fasten_off and leave yarn end long for sewing up putting it together flatten the body a so that all turning chains are on the bottom edge using a wool needle sew all parts to the body as shown below weave in all ends and pour yourself a stiff drink to celebrate making it this far pokemon master dorsal fin g tail fin d eye c pectoral fin b barbel e ventral fin f disclaimer the finished product will not evolve into a gyarados hat the author takes no responsibility for any pokeball-related injuries that may result from wearing this hat in public pokemon and all associated characters are owned by nintendo please don t sue me well i don t give refunds you knew what you were getting © akabekobotan 2016
